channel.title: Need help with simple problem on 508 server
channel.description:
i need to know how to ip ban, some idiot keeps spamming my server and when i do ip ban, it doesnt work it just does a connection thing then they log right back on...
it is getting annoying i have a 508 server which is based off of Z508 source...
its a ip changing server not a client
please help me

item.description:
